node.name: Java
node.rich_text:
working of java : running: (A)compilation: SourceCode.java-->complier(JDK)->bytecode.class (B)execution: bytecode.class → JVM → Assembly code
JVM : Java Virtual Machine JRE : Java Runtime Environment JDK: Java Development Kit
class: big entity where lot of functions are placed....first to be executed
functions/methods : they are told to perform tasks
void main(){ → is a function , void is empty }
